notes.text:
pretty streamlined version for builttotilt's ssa turbo whale
I found that econ sometimes wiffs borg planter, but in the long run econ won me more games than lost
the synergy of abyss soldier and borg planter, whale discard for board control is invaluable
the deck will only brick if whale is in the bottom half of your deck, but sometimes abyss soldier can close out the game on its own with econ and borg planter
alot of people playing kuribo so becareful with econ take plays
the benefit of this version over the restart version with 3 soldier of atlantis is that you dont need to have the yumi part of the combo so you only have to worry about getting whale out
the downside of course is... if you cant get whale then its not good
